description: There exists an undirected tree with n nodes numbered 0 to n - 1. You are given a 2D integer array edges of length n - 1, where edges[i] = [ui, vi] indicates that there is an edge between nodes ui and vi in the tree. Initially, all nodes are unmarked. For each node i: Return an array times where times[i] is the time when all nodes get marked in the tree, if you mark node i at time t = 0. Note that the answer for each times[i] is independent, i.e. when you mark node i all other nodes are unmarked.
